name: dfcoeleqvrel

body.origin:
|- wb(wcoeleqvrel(c0), weqvrel(ccoels(c0)))
-| wb(wcoeleqvrel(c0), weqvrel(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))))
-| wb(weqvrel(ccoels(c0)), weqvrel(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcoeleqvrel(c0), weqvrel(ccoels(c0)))
-| wb(wcoeleqvrel(c0), weqvrel(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))))
-| wb(weqvrel(ccoels(c0)), weqvrel(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(weqvrel(ccoels(c0)), weqvrel(ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0))))
-| wceq(ccoels(c0), ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)))

comment: Alternate definition of the coelement equivalence relation predicate: a coelement equivalence relation is an equivalence relation on coelements. Other alternate definitions should be based on ~ eqvrelcoss2 , ~ eqvrelcoss3 and ~ eqvrelcoss4 when needed. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Nov-2028.)
